MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH46 postcode area of Saughall Massie, affecting properties in Westbrook Road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.18PM on 30th October 2020.
